SimplrPost Lourum Ipsum Description is the pattern of narrative development that aims to make vivid a place, object, character, or group. Description is one of four rhetorical modes, along with exposition, argumentation, and narration. In practice it would be difficult to write literature that drew on just one of the four basic modes Description is the pattern of narrative development that aims to make vivid a place, object, character, or group Description is one of four rhetorical modes, along with exposition, argumentation, and narration. Public Private Public addresses can be viewed and saved by anyone.\n\nPrivate addresses can be saved by user with whom you have shared the address. Search Your address PLUS CODE is Unique address name City and country Town/Region Road name and number Building or establishment name Apartment or unit number Type how you usually give some one direction to your location Address link : Public view Qr Code Share Your address name should be unique. it will be used to generate a link like simplrpost.com/myaddress\n\nThe name should be in lowercase, should not contain whitespaces or special characters. you may substitute the spaces with a dash or underscore. This plus code can be mapped on this app or Google Maps. Text directions helps people to find your address quickly relative to other buildings and landmarks near by. Add a picture of your location. Most people get lost when they are very close to an address. Pictures allow them to identify your address quickly and reduce their ETA by more than 20%. \n\nAdd a picture of your location to make it easier for people like delivery drivers to identify your address without calling you.
